description: The Blockchain Oracle Summit brings everyone working in and around oracles together — driving innovation and collaboration in the future of data.

sessions.name: Panel
sessions.description:
Oracle Extractable Value (OEV): Unlocking New Revenue Models and Sustainability for Oracles & Dapps
Speakers:  Ugur Mersinlioglu, API3, Ariah Klages-Mundt, Gyroscope, Tesa Ho, Flashbots, Hart Lambur, UMA
Moderator:  Shayan Eskandari, theCreed.xyz

sessions.name: Keynote
sessions.description: Filip Koprivec, Head of Developer Relations, Flare

sessions.name: Panel
sessions.description:
Decentralised Interoperability: Striking the Balance in Cross-Chain Messaging and Bridge Design
Speakers:  Thomas Bertani, Hashi Alliance, Layne Haber, Everclear, Angus Lamps, Stargate Finance, Nikhil Suri, Wormhole Foundation, Filip Koprivec, Flare
Moderator:  Sebastian Bürgel, Gnosis

sessions.name: Panel
sessions.description:
DAOs: Navigating Governance Challenges with Oracles
Speakers:  Edmund Edgar, Reality.eth, Doo Wan Nam, StableLab, Anthony Leutenegger, Aragon, Vaughn McKenzie-Landell, Butter
Moderator:  Traver Normandi, Gauntlet

sessions.name: Fireside Chat
sessions.description:
Oracles in Prediction Markets
Speakers:  CJ Hetherington, Limitless Labs, Rossen Yordanov, Azuro, Ivan Fartunov, karpatkey

sessions.name: Fireside Chat
sessions.description:
Oracles Powering On-Chain RWAs
Speakers:  Niklas Kunkel, Chronicle, Lucas Vogelsang, Centrifuge

sessions.name: Panel
sessions.description:
Censorship-Resistant Protocols: Oracle-Less vs. Oracle-Integrated Approaches
Speaker:  Brenda Loya, Tellor, Torgin Mackinga, Chain Security, David Utrobin, Anja Protocol, Omer Goldberg, Chaos Labs, Aditya Arora, Pyth Data Association

sessions.name: What’s Stopping DeFi from Competing with TradFi?
sessions.description: Aditya Arora, Head of Developer Relations, Pyth Data Association

sessions.name: Panel
sessions.description:
Approaches to Oracle Management in Decentralized Lending Markets
Speakers:  Niklas Kunkel, Chronicle, Marcin Kazmierczak, RedStone Oracles, Mateo Pedroza, Venua Protocol, Emilio Frangella, Aave Labs
Moderator:  Michael Lewellen, OpenZeppelin

sessions.name: Panel
sessions.description:
Restaking and the Future of Oracles: Unlocking New Use Cases in AVS
Speaker:  Ismael Hishon-Rezaizadeh, Lagrange, Felix Lutsch, Symbiotic, Matan Si, eOracle, Luke Hajdukiewicz, Eigen Labs
